name: Space Frantic 2
description:
Are you ready to cross the border of stratosphere and discover the galaxy? As a space frontier, you will have to fly through the galaxy on your spaceship, open new planets and colonize them. There are so many stars in the galaxy, which is circled by at least one planet. Our rocket simulator gives you a chance to discover some of them. Put truckers inside the rocket, upgrade your spaceship if it is needed and go on a voyage through the galaxy. Colonize every planet your rocket has landed at, and your truckers will bring you money for upgrading your spaceship and hire more colonizers. Jump beyond the stratosphere and discover new hidden worlds in our new simulator of space frontier: Space Frantic 2.

In this simulator, you will have to discover hidden places of galaxy and colonize unknown planets with your space frontiers. To deliver your truckers to the planet just start the engines and dismount parts of your rocket to boost it. Be careful, if you will not dismount parts of your spaceship in time, your rocket and your every frontier inside will explode. More truckers has reached the planet- more money you will earn. You can spend this in game currency to upgrade your rocket, which will help you discovering galaxy faster and more productive, hire more space frontiers to colonize planets, or just customize your spaceship by buying new awesome skin. How far can you reach? Maybe your friend can go further? Invite your friends, and compete, find out whose spaceship will discover more planets.

Space Frantic 2 is a free to play simulator of discovering the galaxy. Upgrade your rocket, fill it with space frontiers and go on a galaxy voyage, beyond the stratosphere. Dismount parts of your spaceship to reach the destination and colonize unknown planets. You have colonized every planet in a solar system? Do not worry, our galaxy has many more stars, with more planets inside. Invite your friends and compete in discovering the galaxy, just escape the stratosphere and whole space will be in your hands to discover.
